title: Python OOP
description: Master object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python. This 8-week course covers the principles of OOP, including classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism. Gain hands-on experience in designing and implementing OOP concepts in Python applications.

title: MySQL
description: Become a MySQL database expert with this comprehensive 10-week course. Learn SQL, database design, and optimization. Get hands-on experience in managing and querying MySQL databases for web and application development.

title: C Programming
description: Start your programming journey with C. This 6-week course introduces you to the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, control structures, and functions. Build a solid foundation in C and prepare for advanced programming.

title: Algorithm
description: Master algorithms and data structures in this 4-week course. Learn essential algorithmic concepts, sorting algorithms, and search algorithms. Apply your knowledge to solve real-world programming challenges.

title: C++
description: Dive deep into C++ programming in this 12-week course. Explore advanced C++ features, object-oriented programming, and template metaprogramming. Develop C++ applications and libraries like a pro.

title: Software Engineering
description: Become a software engineering expert with this 8-week course. Learn software development methodologies, project management, and software design patterns. Build scalable and maintainable software systems.

title: JavaScript
description: Master JavaScript for web development in this 10-week course. Learn about JavaScript fundamentals, DOM manipulation, and front-end frameworks like React and Angular. Create dynamic and interactive web applications.

title: Data Structures
description: Explore the world of data structures in this 8-week course. Learn about linked lists, trees, graphs, and hash tables. Apply data structures to solve complex programming problems and optimize algorithms.

title: AWS
description: Become proficient in Amazon Web Services (AWS) with this 6-week course. Explore cloud computing, EC2, S3, and other AWS services. Deploy and manage applications on the AWS cloud platform.
